title: Flight to Paris
description: AirFrance AF102, Economy. Arrive early for check-in.
details: Seat 23A. Remember to pack light. Check baggage allowance. Flight confirmation: XYZ123.

title: Hotel Le Grand Paris
description: Check-in to your charming Parisian hotel.
details: Reservation under 'WanderTrack User'. Concierge available for tour bookings. Free WiFi. Breakfast included from 7 AM to 10 AM.

title: Eiffel Tower Visit
location: Eiffel Tower, Champ de Mars, Paris
description: Ascend the iconic Eiffel Tower for breathtaking city views.
details: Pre-booked tickets for Summit access. Entry time: 10:00 AM. Allow 2-3 hours. Security check expected.

title: Dinner at Le Petit Bistro
description: Authentic French cuisine in a cozy atmosphere.
details: Reservation for 2 at 7:30 PM. Try the Coq au Vin. Dress code: Smart Casual.

title: Louvre Museum Tour
description: Explore masterpieces including the Mona Lisa.
details: Guided tour starts at 2:00 PM from the Pyramid entrance. Audio guide available in multiple languages.

title: Train to Lyon
location: Gare de Lyon (Paris) to Lyon Part-Dieu
description: High-speed TGV train journey to Lyon.
details: Carriage 7, Seat 42. Refreshments available on board. Arrive at station 30 mins prior to departure.
